sentence.Network_en: Soviet women carry the main burden of shopping, homemaking and child rearing.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏联的妇女承担的主要义务就是采购, 做家务及抚养孩子.

sentence.Network_en: Homemaking and rearing children are jobs for girls only.
sentence.Network_cn: 家管与抚养小孩都是只限女生做的工作.

sentence.Network_en: Many women still place emphasis on the importance of homemaking.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多女士仍然强调持家的重要.
